title: Experiment in Terror (restored, with intro and outro) (1962, neo-noir, imdb score: 7.3)

sources.title: Experiment In Terror 1962 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Experiment in Terror is a 1962 American neo-noir thriller film released by Columbia Pictures . It was directed by Blake Edwards and written by Mildred Gordon and Gordon Gordon based on their 1961 novel Operation Terror . The film stars Glenn Ford , Lee Remick , Stefanie Powers and Ross Martin . The musical score was composed by Henry Mancini .
